title: Ep. 500 - If Black Lives Matter, Defund Planned Parenthood
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, we are told that we should defund the police to protect black lives. But I’ve got a better defunding campaign that is sure to save many more black lives. Also Five Headlines including the media’s expected pivot back to coronavirus fear mongering. And in our Daily Cancellation, I cancel House Democrats for the most outrageous bit of pandering we have ever seen.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
